name: xml-drafts - for Android (tm)
tagline: Small framework to use xml in android easy
body:
### Welcome to xml-drafts

This small Android(tm)-Framework is an easy way to write an XML-parser based on an XmlPullParser.
Download the source-code and use it as Android-library.

CHECK README FOR MORE INFORMATION!
Andreas Siebert, 
ask at touchableheroes.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
